channel.title: RuneXC PvP release V1!
channel.description:
Hi everybody! This is Elite ( X power x ) and this.. is my first server release, with the client!
Credits- [b](SOURCE)[/b] 40% - Elite & Zach 60% - Xpvxx Source Base [b](CLIENT)[/b] 75% - Project Courage Client Base! 25% - Elite & Zach
Client Download Link : http://files.filefront.com/RuneXc+PvP+clientrar/;13488875;/fileinfo.html Server Download Link : http://files.filefront.com/RuneXC+v1+sourcerar/;13494805;/fileinfo.html
Includes: *Dragon Claws *Vestas Longsword *Dragon Platebody *Donator Shop *Custom skill arena- made by Elite. *Dragonfiresheild, lots of customs! *Working void, and NPC aggression! *Summoning added by Elite! * Custom Major *
The CLIENT is a BIG file, 43MB. I will clean later, but don't complain if it takes 3-5 minutes!
[code]::rxcskillarena * Custom skill arena made by Elite! ::home command removed, failure teler's. Edited bonuses! Edited Armadyl Godsword special! Edited Vengance quote, effect and skull! New sprites, and models! Custom Log-IN quotes . *E-G , the owner .. has logged in. The Co-owner .. has logged in! Added several GlobalObjects! Added Custom Summoning; ::pickup 10650 1, drop to summon. It attacks your opponent![/code]
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2z4wom0.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/33arwhi.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2wpikpc.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2r7aiw2.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/35i3fxk.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2zodikk.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2pspqfl.jpg[/img]
Thanks.Please post. I will TAKE DOWN, if you don't post, or say anything positive :(
Best Regards, Elite! *X power x, Lady Convict*

item.description:
@rofllewisrofl wrote:

[quote=“x power x, post:16, topic:268366”]Wtf? I never said you leeched. And the train is the same, but i added a new train area, as well. Take your lazy ass, and look for it in client.java

And i added 1 custom item,and edited spec and bonus for it. Im MR.FAILURE TOO. Thanks for knowing my other name![/quote]

You need to download my source before you judge me. Then people won’t judge you. That source was only 45% my credit’s. Notice how it says 1.0? I release a 1.2 yesterday. It’s 55% my credit’s and very updated. I added 4 custom model’s, I re-did the shop’s… Fixed the D claw’s spec, and I’m adding pest control atm.

So GTFO.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneXC PvP release V1!
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“lewis`, post:8, topic:268366”][quote author=x power x link=topic=354182.msg2713690#msg2713690 date=1237497071]

5%? I should get 100% all you’ve done is slapped your logo on and your ip into the client.java!

Oh so, you made this source? I should give you 80% of client…
But im 50% of the source!

Guys , reporting me? This isn’t a leech. I used it as a base, but i changed…

Starter place & items!
Custom arena & summoning!
Custom item, and vengeance edited!

And some more. So yes its like a 30% leech, but not rly so shut up!
[/quote]

its a shame the veng is CLIENT SIDED and u do not deserve credit for changing what he says when he vengs, starter place = what 10 secs of time? items is VERY simple does not deserve any credits, custom arena and summoning… no? why lie … they was there before customs items were there and there client sides u fucking moron…

gtfo leecher.[/quote]
We are not here to flame new members. We are here to give constructive criticism.

On Topic -
I agree with the comments above, referring to the ‘leech’, but I see you have added models, etc. This is just a V1; there’s always room for improvement in V2.

To others -
Instead of flaming, tell him how he can improve.

Read full topic
